name: 網路行銷
restrict: ◎必須先修過【MBM0002  行銷管理】 ◎課程不開放上修
description: 自網際網路興起後，網路已經成為嶄新的行銷領域與企業的兵家必爭之地，網路行銷更是數位時代下引人關注的重要議題之一。因網際網路的特色與影響力所及，全球逐步邁入電子化社區，國家疆界益發模糊，個人化行銷成為可能，產品、價格、通路與促銷等行銷工具受到衝擊，速度與回應能力更成為企業競爭優勢之所在。在這種超競爭(hyper-competition)的全球環境之下，如何掌握網路族群的偏好，提供適當的網站內容，建立一對一行銷，乃是當代網路行銷的挑戰。本課程將分實務面與理論面兩部分進行探討。在實務面，本課程介紹網路行銷的特色與重要議題；在理論面，本課程納入近期與網路行銷相關之期刊論文，以使同學對網路行銷研究有初步的接觸，有利於往後研究興趣與方向的建立。
syllabus:
1\. Course Introduction

2\. Chapter 5 Web Business Models

3\. Shim, Soyeon, Mary Ann Eastlick, Sherry L. Lotz, and Patricia Warrington (2001), “An Online Prepurchase Intentions Model: The Role of Intention to Search.” Journal of Retailing, Vol. 77(3), pp. 397-416.

4\. Chapter 6 Online Branding

5\. Yoon, Doyle, Sejung Marina Choi, and Dongyoung Sohn (2008), “Building Customer Relationships in an Electronic Age: The Role of Interactivity of E-commerce Web Sites,” Psychology & Marketing, Vol. 25(7), pp. 602-618.

6\. Chapter 7 Usability, Credibility, and Persuasion

7\. Gershoff, Andrew D. and Ashesh Mukherjee (2003), “Consumer Acceptance of On-line Agent Advice: Extremity and positivity Effects,” Journal of Consumer Psychology, Vol.13(1/2), pp.161-170.

8\. Chapter 8 Traffic Building

9\. Ilfeld, Johanna S. and Russell S. Winer (2002), “Generating Website Traffic,” Journal of Advertising Research, Vol. 42(5), pp.49-61.

10\. Chapter 9 Personalization

11\. Komiak, Sherrie Y. X. and Izak Benbasat (2006), “The Effects of Personalization and Familiarity on Trust and Adoption of Recommendation Agents,” MIS Quarterly, Vol. 30(4), pp. 941-960.

12\. Chapter 10 Creating Commitment

13\. Gruen, Thomas W., Talai Osmonbekov, and Andrew J. Czaplewski (2006), “eWOM: The Impact of Customer-to-Customer Online Know-how Exchange on Customer Value and Loyalty,” Journal of Business Research, Vol. 59(4), pp. 449-456.

14\. Chapter 12 Pricing in a Online World

15\. Koukova, Nevena T., P. K. Kannan, and Brian T. Ratchford (2008), “Product Form Bundling: Implications for Marketing Digital Products,” Journal of Retailing, Vol. 84(2), pp. 181-194.

16\. Chapter 13 Internet Retailing

17\. van Birgelen, Marcel, Ad de Jong, Ko de Ruyter (2006), “Multi-channel Service Retailing: The Effects of Channel Performance Satisfaction on Behavioral Intentions,” Journal of Retailing, Vol. 82(4), pp. 367-377.

18\. Deadline for Term Paper.

methodologies.note: 每次授課先由教師講述該次單元主要內容
分為每次授課間討論、期刊論文報告討論、個案討論
分組進行專題研究、撰寫報告、口頭報告
